message: I thought he might have wandered off to buy something again, but I can't find him at any of the shops.
I leave the bustling main street and head down a less populated alley.
As I make my way down the alley, I hear shouts from up ahead.
There's something happening at the side of the road.
A fight? I have a bad feeling about this...

name: チンピラＡ
message: "Asshole!"

name: チンピラＢ
message: "F-Fuck!"
...I knew it.
Several men are beating the crap out of each other in the dark, narrow alley.
And in the middle of it all... is Noiz.

name: チンピラＡ
message: "Urgh!"
Noiz lands an uppercut on one of the men, who falls on his back with a grunt.
There are already two men on the ground, both wearing suits.
Unless I'm mistaken, they look like gangsters.
...Shit!

name: 蒼葉
message: "Noiz!"
Everyone stops and stares at me.

name: チンピラＢ
message: "Who the fuck?! You with this guy?!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Uh, well, I guess you could say that."

name: チンピラＡ
message: "Well this little shit went on a fucking rampage. What are you gonna do about this situation, huh?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Look, I'm really sorry. He's just a dumb kid who doesn't know when to stop. ...I'm sorry. I'm really sorry."
I bow repeatedly while inching closer to Noiz.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Sorry. Sorry. I'm really... Run!"
I grab Noiz's arm and make a break for it. I know from experience that the only way to win fights like this is to run.

name: チンピラＢ
message: "Hey, wait!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Ngh, let go!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Shut up and run!"
We break out onto the main street.
If we can just disappear in the crowd...!
I slow down and try to blend in with the milling pedestrians.
...After walking for a while, I casually turn around to look.
No one's following us.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Phew..."
We made it, somehow... though it was awfully close.
What the hell was Noiz thinking?
I drag him all the way back to Glitter.
